content.text: Match ends, Ludogorets Razgrad 1, Real Madrid 2.
Second Half ends, Ludogorets Razgrad 1, Real Madrid 2.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Vladislav Stoyanov.
Attempt saved. Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Karim Benzema.
